title: Wildfire Out Of Control - Headed toward NY - Beware
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Wildfire Out Of Control - Headed toward NY - Beware
posts.post_content:
:eek:

This card will be delivered dry without chemical fire retardants.

You can control this Wildfire yourself with your purchase of a very decent "raw" copy of Mr. Schulte (in the full monty front pose) with the Piedmont 150 back.
.
There is a slight wrinkle left of the right ear, but no creasing.  The right lower corner displays a bit of fraying, but rounding of the corners is uniform. Centering is excellent.  The edges are fine.  A solid VG in my opinion. 

This card will be shipped to your collection for $40 ($41 for regular paypal).

An offer might be considered in you favor.  You never know.:confused:
A polite three day bump.  Thank you very much for looking.

Hi Frank,
Here are my offers, 10,20,30:eek:
your choice
larry:D

Frank,

If you're will to do a single-card break with 82 spots at a price point of 50 cents per spot, I'm in for one.

Please call me to confirm at 1-888-HALF-DOLLAR.

Great idea Rob.

3 of 82 spoken for and counting.;)

Don't miss out on this extraordinary card break.

Rob 1
Ben 2

All you need to do is bump the price up to full retail first and then do the card break.;)

Also is it winner take all or are you going to cut up the card so everybody gets a piece? I am in for a couple spots if it is cut up. Being a 89 Fleer Bill Ripken collector I am hoping for the bat knob piece.:D
